formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'FILE' =-
[Syntax] FILE(<filename>,<offset>,<length>)
[Synopsis] Obtains the contents of a file
[Description] <offset> may be specified as any number. If negative, <offset> specifies the number of bytes back from the end of the file. <length>, if specified, will limit the length of the data read to that size.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
